meanings.definition: A person or thing that screams loudly.
meanings.sent1: The screamer in the haunted house scared everyone with their loud screams.
meanings.sent2: The baby was a real screamer whenever he didn't get his way.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was a little screamer, mimicking all the loud noises in the house.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm outside sounded like a giant screamer in the night.
meanings.sent5: The fire alarm was a relentless screamer, making sure everyone evacuated safely.

meanings.definition: A type of roller coaster known for its intense drops and high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The new screamer at the amusement park was so fast that it made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The kids lined up eagerly to ride the famous screamer roller coaster.
meanings.sent3: The screamer roller coaster was so thrilling that even the adults felt like kids again.
meanings.sent4: The screamer coaster twisted and turned like a wild beast on the tracks.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the screamer coaster echoed through the park, drawing in thrill-seekers from all around.

meanings.definition: A type of goal scored in soccer that is powerful and difficult for the goalkeeper to stop.
meanings.sent1: The striker's screamer in the final minutes of the game secured their team's victory.
meanings.sent2: The crowd erupted in cheers as the screamer goal hit the back of the net.
meanings.sent3: The screamer goal was so powerful that it left the goalkeeper stunned.
meanings.sent4: The screamer shot flew past the goalkeeper like a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The screamer goal was etched in the history of the tournament as one of the best ever scored.
